settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text: We ship to Canada, the USA and select International countries - Austrialia, New Zealand, England, France, Germany, Switzerland, Japan. We are working on expanding our shipping network and appreciate your patience.

settings.title: How much is shipping and how long does it take?
settings.text:
Flat rate shipping to Canada:¬†C$9.50, usually 2 to 8 business days

Flat rate shipping to USA:¬†US$8, usually 2 to 8 business days

International shipping:¬†C$12.50, usually 10-20 business days¬†

Shipping is FREE on orders over $75.¬†This refers to Expedited Shipping for Canada Post and First Class USPS for USA. Shipping is 2-8 business days.

Why can‚Äôt we ship ‚Äúregular‚Äù mail, you might wonder?

Because of the nature of our products and packaging (which aren‚Äôt always flat) we don't have the options of regular or media mail. (Not to mention: regular mail is also untracked and takes 2 times longer to reach you! And who wants to wait longer for their goodies to arrive?)

‚ÄúWhy do I have to pay for shipping? I‚Äôm used to getting free shipping!‚Äù

While we offer C$9.50 / USD $8 shipping on orders under $60, it REALLY costs us closer to C$12 on average to ship within North America. We know it sounds crazy ‚Äî but we pay the difference out of pocket so that we can offer the best flat rate to you!

It‚Äôs tough being a small retailer (we are just 3 women!) up against the ‚Äúfree shipping movement‚Äù of our bigger competitors. But we‚Äôre doing our best, and we‚Äôre grateful for your understanding. üíô

settings.title: What if I'm not happy with my order?
settings.text: We want you to be 100% happy with your purchase! If for any reason you are not happy or have a problem with your order, we'll solve it to your satisfaction.¬†Simply get in touch with us at hello@qforquinn.com.

settings.title: Are all your socks seamless?
settings.text: Yes. Every pair we make has a¬†seamlessor invisible toe seam to maximize comfort. We take pride in knowing we have thousands of customers who are highly sensitive to their toe seam wearing our socks comfortably. Learn more about our seamless socks¬†here.

settings.title: Where are you based?
settings.text: We are a small business headquartered in Toronto, Canada

settings.title: Have other questions?
settings.text: Check out our full FAQ page or contact us at hello@qforquinn.com.
